fields.description: What about rumours that some foods can prevent or treat the infection?
fields.title: What about rumours that some foods can prevent or treat the infection?
fields.content:
There is no known cure for Ebola. You are advised to seek credible health
advice about Ebola virus disease from the health center near you or the
ministry of Health on a number given below. While there is no specific drug
against Ebola, the best treatment is intensive supportive treatment provided
in the clinics by health workers using strict infection control procedures.
